plot: A young boy gets along better with the animals he befriends around his family's Canadian farm than with the people he lives with.
title: The Boy Who Talked to Badgers
plot_es: A young boy gets along better with the animals he befriends around his family's Canadian farm than with the people he lives with.
original_name: The Boy Who Talked to Badgers
plot_en: A young boy gets along better with the animals he befriends around his family's Canadian farm than with the people he lives with.
